Make Soap from Goat Milk

textiles crafting soap
Author: Holly Chiantaretto and Hallow Springs Farm
Published by: Mother Earth News

Learn how to make this Simple Goat Milk Soap Recipe using frozen goat milk, lye, and therapeutic grade oils.
